module.name: Wake Up Calls
module.description: Create simple hotel-style wake up call services.
module.changelog: *1.2.5* Project moved to Github and minor fixes for FreePBX compatibility *1.2.4* Tickets #269 (http://projects.colsolgrp.net/issues/show/269) 12-31-2009 *1.2.3* Tickets #163, #164, #165, #166 (http://projects.colsolgrp.net/projects/hotelwakeup/issues) 7-7-2009 *1.2.2* Ticket #138 (http://projects.colsolgrp.net/projects/hotelwakeup/issues) 6-1-2009 *1.2.1* Ticket #134 (http://projects.colsolgrp.net/projects/hotelwakeup/issues) 6-1-2009 *1.2.0* Removed dependancy on default db id/pw (tshif) 4-8-2009 *1.1.0* Quotation marks around Caller ID name now optional - for some unusual systems that did not like them. (tshif) 3-30-2009 *1.0.2* Added more info data url pointed to wiki (tshif) 3-2-09 *1.0.1* Increase max entension length to 10 to accomodate outside calls (tshif) 2-17-09 *1.0.0* First Module release (tshif) 2-17-09
